summary:
What do I want to become when I grow up? That's a question I asked myself for a long time. My childhood dream, playing for Ajax, was soon out of the question (I wasnâ€™t even closeâ€¦). So what else? 

After switching some studies I dropped out and started working at an Acquiring Bank, where I took my first steps in the world of payments. Soon after I thought it was time to take the next step in my career and I started my own Payments consultancy business. And before I knew it, I was the founder of a Collecting Payment Service Provider a few years later, with an exit in 2017. 

After some great adventures, with ups and downs, I see myself as an advisor, investor, and connector in FinTech.

From Amsterdam, I connect the dots in FinTech. Not only for myself but also for the FinTech community, which probably includes you!

With my daily content and news updates from the FinTech space, I am your filter to cut through all the noise and make sure you donâ€™t miss a beat! 

Let me do the heavy lifting for you, so you can focus on your work and keep the FinTech space on ðŸ”¥

Sign up for my channels to stay up to date:

ðŸ‘‰ Newsletters -  https://marcelvanoost.com/newsletter

ðŸ‘‰ Twitter - https://twitter.com/oost_marcel

ðŸ‘‰ Telegram - https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAE-X6LEz9MbtL6xyaQ?mc_cid=308d7a2eee&mc_eid=a86bca48f3/

ðŸ‘‰ Podcast - https://anchor.fm/marcel-van-oost

And did I mention that Iâ€™m a FinTech Focussed (Payments, Digital Banking, and Open Banking) Angel Investor as well? 

If you are looking for the best deal flow in FinTech and you would like to co-invest alongside me and many other big names in FinTech? Sign up for my syndicate free of charge! 

ðŸ˜‡ --> https://marcelvanoost.com/angel-investors-syndicate
